title: Distil Sans
content:
Hi

I'm a graphic designer from the UK. I've wanted to design a typeface for a long long time and recently have had some time away from corporate design to finally have a go.

I'd be pleased to hear peoples comments positive or negative

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014032726im_/http:/typophile.com/files/distil-sans_6342.gif)
author: Jerome Iveson

comments.content:
yeah I reckon pictures could help
